harmonizR 2.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • Main usage of harmonizR

Reference

All functions

apply_valueType()

Apply valueType of a datadictionnary to a dataset

count_tag()

Count tags in a data dictionary.

data_dictionary_create()

Create a data dictionary in the Maelstrom Research formats from a dataset

file_index_create()

Create an index of files in a folder

file_index_read()

Read, source and open objects from in an index of files

file_index_search()

Search an index of files

get_all_na_col()

Extract columns that are all 'NA' from a dataset.

harmo_env_create()

Create folders for a harmonization project

harmo_process()

Generate harmonized dataset(s) and annotated data processing elements file

harmo_summary()

Generate summary of data processing elements using annotated data processing elements R object

harmo_visual_report()

Generate a visual report for a harmonized dataset

harmonizR_help()

Call the help center for full documentation.

identify_plot_type()

Generate R script of plots based on the 'viz_type' of the variable.

identify_viz_type()

Identify visual type of a variable based on value type.

opal_files_pull()

Download files from an Opal environment into the R environment

opal_files_push()

Upload files to an Opal environment.

opal_project_create()

Create a project in an Opal environment

opal_tables_pull()

Download tables and data dictionaries from an Opal environment into the R environment

opal_tables_push()

Upload a tibble from the R environment in an Opal environment as tables in an Opal project.

plot_bar()

Draw bar plot of one (possibly grouped) column in a dataset.

plot_box()

Draw box plot of one (possibly grouped) column in a dataset.

plot_date()

Draw lollipop plot of one (possibly grouped) time related column in a dataset.

plot_density()

Draw density line plot of one (possibly grouped) column in a dataset.

plot_histogram()

Draw histogram plot of one (possibly grouped) column in a dataset.

plot_main_word()

Draw bar plot of one (possibly grouped) open text column in a dataset.

plot_pie()

Draw pie plot of one (possibly grouped) column in a dataset.

plot_pie_valid_value()

Draw pie plot of one (possibly grouped) column in a dataset. (valid, non-valid and missing values)

read_csv_any_formats()

Read all csv files using readr::read_csv and avoid errors

read_excel_allsheets()

Read all Excel sheets using readxl::read_excel recursively.

study_visual_report()

Generate a visual report for a study-specific dataset

summary_category()

Create datatable of one (possibly grouped) category-type column in a dataset.

summary_numerical()

Create datatable of one (possibly grouped) numerical-type column in a dataset.

summary_text()

Create datatable of one (possibly grouped) text-type column in a dataset.

template_viz_report()

Create a bookdown. template for the visual report.
